text:
Dawn Evelyeen Paris (also: Anne Shirley; April 17, 1918 – July 4, 1993) was an American movie actress. She played Jeanne in "Chasing Yesterday". She also played Jenny Yates in "Chatterbox".
Under the name Dawn O'Day, Shirley was a child actress.
Shirley was born in New York City. She died from lung cancer at age seventy-five.
